text: Kazem HajirAzad (; March 21, 1950, Tehran, Iran) is an Iranian movie and theatre actor. He has played the role of Rostam in the movie The Death Story of Sohrab directed by Farshad Ahmadi Dastgerdi. ==References== * == Other websites == *Kazem HajirAzad Website Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Tehran Category:Iranian movie actors
title: Kazem HajirAzad
